title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running large language models locally with a simple API and model library.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, published on PyPI as ollama.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, available on npm as ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (langchain-ollama on PyPI) for using Ollama models in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama with multi-model chat, file uploads, and admin panel.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that proxies chat to a local Ollama instance, configurable per guild.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-enhanced CLI wrapper around ollama with interactive prompts and conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a GitHub Copilot replacement with inline suggestions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run Retrieval-Augmented Generation stack using Ollama, ChromaDB, and LangChain.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selector and PVC support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java client library for Ollama (Maven Central: ollama4j) with sync/async APIs and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Unofficial C# .NET client for Ollama with fluent API and streaming support, published on NuGet.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform desktop GUI for Ollama built with Tauri and React, packaged for Windows/Mac/Linux.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up an Ollama service inside CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module wrapping the Ollama REST API with decorators and dependency injection.

title: ollama-redis
summary: Redis vector-store plugin for Ollama enabling semantic caching and similarity search.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that answers questions using local Ollama models with thread support and rate limiting.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat interface for Ollama with session memory and model switching dropdown.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to provision an EC2 GPU instance with Ollama and models pre-installed.
